title: BRIEF-Bank Of Maharashtra Says RBI Denies Bank's Request To Set Off Accumulated Losses Of 73.60 Bln Rupees
text:
BRIEF-Bank Of Maharashtra Says RBI Denies Bank's Request To Set Off Accumulated Losses Of 73.60 Bln Rupees

Stock Markets 50 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 16:51)

BRIEF-Bank Of Maharashtra Says RBI Denies Bank's Request To Set Off Accumulated Losses Of 73.60 Bln Rupees Oct 9 (Reuters) - Bank of Maharashtra Ltd : * RBI DENIES BANK'S REQUEST TO SET OFF ACCUMULATED LOSSES OF 73.60 BILLION RUPEES AGAINST BALANCE IN SHARE PREMIUM, REVENUE RESERVE ACCOUNTS

BRIEF-Bank Of Maharashtra Says RBI Denies Bank's Request To Set Off Accumulated Losses Of 73.60 Bln Rupees
